description:
Feeling the passionate waves of Teshima`s ride of the soul during the Minegayama Hill Climb, Sakamichi rides all out to catch up to Ashikiba! Who will win the race...?! After the race, Ashikiba meets with third-year Fukutomi. He has his own past... Later, Tadokoro starts his last race, the Bay Coast Criterium. A three-way race between keepers of the Sohoku sprinter`s spirit, Tadokoro, Naruko, and Aoyagi begins!
Source: crunchyroll
